peril.views.slick.board

Class SlickContinent

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.util.Viewable
      • peril.views.slick.util.Clickable
        • peril.views.slick.board.SlickContinent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public final class SlickContinent
extends Clickable
implements java.util.Observer
    The visual representation of a ModelContinent. This observes the ModelContinent and is updated when the model changes.
    Since:
    2018-02-17
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Observer, Clickable, SlickModelView

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ModelContinent model
      The ModelContinent that this SlickContinent displays to the user.
      private SlickModelView view
      The SlickModelView that is used to map the ModelContinent to the SlickContinent.

      Constructs a new SlickContinent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SlickCountry getCountry(Point click)
      Retrieves the country using a specified Point by iterating through all the SlickCountrys in the SlickContinent and checks if the specifies Point is inside a SlickCountry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlickContinent

        public SlickContinent(Region region,
                      ModelContinent model,
                      SlickModelView view)
        Constructs a new SlickContinent.
        Parameters:
        region - The Region that represents this continent on screen.
        model - The ModelContinent that this SlickContinent displays to the user.
        view - The SlickModelView that is used to map the ModelContinent to the SlickContinent.

    • Method Detail

      • getCountry

        public SlickCountry getCountry(Point click)
        Retrieves the country using a specified Point by iterating through all the SlickCountrys in the SlickContinent and checks if the specifies Point is inside a SlickCountry.
        Parameters:
        click - The Point position of the click.
        Returns:
        The SlickCountry that was clicked or null if non were clicked.

                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Updates this SlickContinent.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
